text: WBTV-LP (99.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Burlington, Vermont. The station is owned by Vermont Community Access Media (VCAM). It airs a variety radio format. The station was assigned the WBTV-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on December 2, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * BTV-LP BTV-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in the United States Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Chittenden County, Vermont
title: WBTV-LP
